breakfast.name: On flight
breakfast.notes: Breakfast served on HU718 Hainan Airlines flight

lunch.name: 珮姐老火锅 (Peijie Hotpot)
lunch.location: 朝东路朝天门来福士广场2楼108号 (Raffles Chongqing, 2F)
lunch.notes: Located inside Raffles mall, convenient for jet lag recovery. Light hotpot lunch before evening dinner.

dinner.name: 见山·江景山野火锅 (Jianshan Riverfront Hotpot)
dinner.location: 龙门浩老街24号 (Longmenhao Old Street No.24)
dinner.notes: MUST-DO: Authentic hillside hotpot with spectacular Chongqing city and river views. Near planned attraction 龙门浩. Reservations recommended for window seats.

breakfast.name: Hotel breakfast or train station snacks
breakfast.location: Raffles Chongqing or Chongqing train station
breakfast.notes: Early departure at 07:00 for Bazhong train. Grab breakfast at hotel or station.

lunch.name: Family home-cooked meal
lunch.notes: Lunch with family at home. Chinese New Year's Eve preparations.

dinner.name: Family Chinese New Year's Eve dinner (年夜饭)
dinner.notes: Chinese New Year's Eve celebration dinner with family. Traditional dishes and festive atmosphere.

breakfast.name: 老五酱肉包子 (Lao Wu Jiang Rou Baozi)
breakfast.notes: MUST-DO: Most authentic Bazhong breakfast. Famous local pork buns with special sauce. Early morning visit before sightseeing.

lunch.name: 清真老七牛肉 (Halal Lao Qi Niu Rou)
lunch.notes: MUST-DO: Local specialty beef dishes. Popular halal restaurant. Visit before afternoon train to Chengdu.

dinner.name: 饕林餐厅 (Taolin - Taikoo Li)
dinner.location: 大慈寺天仙桥北路3号SOHO公寓1楼 (near Taikoo Li)
dinner.notes: Evening exploration of Taikoo Li area. Contemporary Sichuan cuisine in trendy location. Good for jet-lagged travelers.

breakfast.name: 明婷饭店 (Mingting Fandian)
breakfast.location: 外曹家巷26号附15号 (Red Star Bridge area)
breakfast.notes: MUST-DO: Early breakfast before 09:00 panda visit. Famous local breakfast spot with authentic Chengdu dishes.

lunch.name: 牛膳寿喜锅 (Wagyu Sukiyaki - Spring Xi Road)
lunch.location: 东大街下东大街段2号蓝光·时代华章F1层 (near Chunxi Road)
lunch.notes: ALTERNATIVE to 牛丞丞 (not found). All-you-can-eat wagyu beef buffet. After panda visit, before Jinli Ancient Street.

dinner.name: Airport light meal
dinner.notes: Light dinner before 14:35 flight to Shanghai. Arrive Shanghai 17:20, late dinner on Nanjing Road.

breakfast.name: 小杨生煎 (Xiaoyang Shengjian)
breakfast.location: 宁波路178号 (Ningbo Road, near hotel)
breakfast.notes: Famous Shanghai pan-fried buns (生煎包). Quick breakfast near Nanjing Road hotel.

lunch.name: 佳乐汤包 (Jiale Soup Dumplings)
lunch.location: 黄河路90号 (Huanghe Road Food Street)
lunch.notes: Near People's Square. Famous xiaolongbao spot. Part of city exploration day.

dinner.name: 人和馆 (Renheguan - Zhaojiabin Road)
dinner.notes: MUST-DO: Michelin-recommended authentic Shanghai local cuisine (本帮菜). Reservations recommended.

breakfast.name: 莱莱小笼 (Lailai Xiaolongbao)
breakfast.notes: Another famous xiaolongbao spot. Early breakfast before full day at Disneyland.

lunch.name: Shanghai Disneyland - in-park dining
lunch.notes: Full day at Disneyland. Various quick-service and table-service options inside park. Budget 150 CNY per person.

dinner.name: Shanghai Disneyland - in-park dining
dinner.notes: Stay for evening parade and fireworks. Dinner inside park before closing.

breakfast.name: Hotel area cafe
breakfast.notes: Relaxed breakfast near hotel. Recovery day after Disneyland.

lunch.name: 白茸·新派鲁菜·胶东海鲜 (Bairong Shandong Cuisine)
lunch.location: 中山东二路558号BFC北区2幢104a (BFC Bund Financial Center)
lunch.notes: Michelin-listed upscale Shandong cuisine. Near Bund. Elegant dining experience.

dinner.name: AJIYA 炭火烧肉 (Ajiya Japanese BBQ)
dinner.location: 江宁路445号时美大厦402室 (Jing'an area)
dinner.notes: MUST-DO: High-quality Japanese yakiniku. Popular spot, reservations essential. Great for couples.

breakfast.name: Quick breakfast near hotel
breakfast.notes: Early flight at 09:05. Quick breakfast before airport departure.

lunch.name: Airport or in-flight
lunch.location: Shanghai Pudong Airport or Beijing Daxing Airport
lunch.notes: Arrive Beijing 11:25. Lunch at airport before heading to university for registration.

dinner.name: Quick dinner before show
dinner.notes: Evening performance 舞剧《只此青绿》. Quick pre-show dinner. Light meal recommended.

breakfast.name: Hotel breakfast
breakfast.notes: Morning before girlfriend's university orientation. Simple hotel breakfast.

lunch.name: University area restaurant
lunch.notes: During orientation break. Quick lunch near campus.

dinner.name: Neighborhood exploration
dinner.notes: First night in rental apartment. Explore local dining options near new home.

breakfast.name: Neighborhood breakfast spot
breakfast.notes: Establish morning routine. Find reliable breakfast spot near apartment.

lunch.name: Tsinghua/Peking University area
lunch.notes: During campus exploration. Student-friendly dining options.

dinner.name: 南门涮肉 (Nanmen Shaorourou - Zhongguancun area)
dinner.location: 北洼路28号 (Beiwa Road, near universities)
dinner.notes: Famous Beijing-style lamb hotpot. Near university area. Great introduction to Beijing cuisine.

breakfast.name: 护国寺小吃 (Huguo Temple Snacks)
breakfast.location: 中关村南路甲2号一层3号 (Zhongguancun)
breakfast.notes: Famous Beijing traditional breakfast snacks. Near apartment area. Try various small dishes.

lunch.name: Local noodle restaurant
lunch.notes: Continue neighborhood exploration. Find good noodle spot.

dinner.name: 全聚德烤鸭 (Quanjude Peking Duck - Tsinghua Park)
dinner.location: 中关村东路1号院清华科技园·启迪科技大厦A座1层
dinner.notes: Famous Quanjude chain near university area. Classic Beijing roast duck experience.

breakfast.name: Cafe near apartment
breakfast.notes: Weekday morning. Find cozy cafe with WiFi for girlfriend to study.

lunch.name: 方砖厂69号炸酱面 (Beijing Zhajiangmian)
lunch.location: 南锣鼓巷2号 (if visiting Nanluoguxiang) or nearby
lunch.notes: Famous Beijing fried sauce noodles (炸酱面). Traditional Beijing dish.

dinner.name: 聚宝源 (Jubaoyuan - Niujie)
dinner.notes: Famous halal restaurant in Niujie Muslim quarter. Authentic Beijing Muslim cuisine. Very popular, expect queues.

breakfast.name: 尹三豆汁 (Yinsan Douzhir - Qianmen area)
breakfast.location: 前门大栅栏街1号一楼 (Qianmen Dashilan)
breakfast.notes: IF visiting Qianmen/Forbidden City area. Try Beijing douzhir (fermented mung bean drink) - acquired taste. Have backup food ready.

lunch.name: 四季民福烤鸭 (Sijimingfu Duck - Qianmen)
lunch.notes: Popular roast duck chain. Better value than Quanjude. Near Forbidden City if visiting today.

dinner.name: 花家怡园 (Huajia Yiyuan)
dinner.notes: Upscale Chinese restaurant. Beautiful courtyard setting. Mix of Sichuan and Beijing dishes. Good for special evening.

breakfast.name: Neighborhood regular breakfast
breakfast.notes: Established routine. Favorite local breakfast spot.

lunch.name: 798 Art District cafe (if visiting 798)
lunch.notes: IF visiting 798 Art District. Many trendy cafes and restaurants. English-friendly area.

dinner.name: 庭院江南菜·烤鸭·江浙菜 (Jiangnan Cuisine & Duck)
dinner.location: 知春路111号一层 (Zhichun Road, Zhongguancun)
dinner.notes: Near apartment. Lighter alternative to heavy Beijing food. Jiangnan-style cuisine with roast duck option.

breakfast.name: Weekend brunch spot
breakfast.notes: Weekend - sleep in, find nice brunch spot. English-friendly area preferred.

lunch.name: 紫光园 (Ziguangyuan)
lunch.location: 王府井大街99号世纪大厦F1层 (if visiting Wangfujing)
lunch.notes: Chain restaurant with authentic Beijing dishes. Affordable and tourist-friendly.

dinner.name: 海底捞火锅 (Haidilao Hotpot)
dinner.location: 王府井大街银泰in88三层 (Wangfujing) or near apartment
dinner.notes: Famous service-oriented hotpot chain. Fun experience. English-friendly staff and menu.

breakfast.name: Weekend breakfast
breakfast.notes: Weekend day. Flexible based on activities planned.

lunch.name: 大董烤鸭 (Da Dong Duck)
lunch.location: 王府井大街301号喜悦购物中心5层 (Wangfujing)
lunch.notes: Upscale contemporary roast duck. Known for crispy duck skin. More expensive but excellent quality.

dinner.name: Nanluoguxiang area dining
dinner.notes: IF visiting Nanluoguxiang. Many small restaurants and cafes. Trendy area with mix of traditional and modern.

breakfast.name: Regular breakfast spot
breakfast.notes: Monday morning routine. Quick breakfast before day activities.

lunch.name: University area lunch
lunch.notes: Near university area. Affordable local options.

dinner.name: 清真·鸦儿李记·涮肉 (Ya'er Liji - Niujie)
dinner.notes: Another famous Niujie halal hotpot. Different from Jubaoyuan. Explore Muslim quarter.

breakfast.name: Quick breakfast
breakfast.notes: Weekday constraint. Quick breakfast, no far trips during day.

lunch.name: Neighborhood lunch
lunch.notes: Stay close to apartment area during day (weekday constraint).

dinner.name: 眉州东坡 (Meizhou Dongpo)
dinner.notes: Evening activities OK. Popular Sichuan chain. Girlfriend may enjoy Sichuan flavors. Multiple locations for convenience.

breakfast.name: Regular breakfast
breakfast.notes: Weekday morning. Established routine.

lunch.name: Local noodles or dumplings
lunch.notes: Weekday constraint - stay near apartment during day.

dinner.name: 北平楼烤鸭·京菜 (Beiping Lou)
dinner.notes: Evening activities OK. Local duck restaurant in residential area. Mix of roast duck and Beijing dishes.

breakfast.name: Breakfast near apartment
breakfast.notes: Weekday morning. Last few days of trip.

lunch.name: Favorite spot revisit
lunch.notes: Revisit favorite restaurant from trip. Comfort food.

dinner.name: Special farewell dinner - your choice
dinner.notes: Wrap-up activities. Choose a favorite from the trip or try something special. Consider returning to 花家怡园 or trying upscale option.

breakfast.name: Final breakfast together
breakfast.location: Favorite local spot or special brunch
breakfast.notes: Last day of trip. Choose somewhere meaningful or girlfriend's favorite.

lunch.name: Light lunch near apartment
lunch.notes: Relaxed final day. Easy lunch near apartment.

dinner.name: Simple dinner
dinner.notes: Prepare for your departure. Keep it simple. Focus on quality time rather than fancy restaurant.

currency_note: All costs are estimates in CNY per person. Exchange rate: 1 CNY ≈ 0.13 EUR (Feb 2026). Convert to EUR by multiplying CNY × 0.13.
notes: All costs are estimates in CNY per person. Key highlights: Day 1 hillside hotpot with city view (见山江景火锅), Day 3 must-visit Bazhong breakfast (老五酱肉包子) and lunch (老七牛肉), Day 4-5 Chengdu must-do restaurants (明婷饭店, 饕林), Day 5-7 Shanghai Michelin/recommended spots (人和馆, AJIYA, 白茸), Beijing offers variety of local cuisine (Peking duck, Beijing hotpot, zhajiangmian, halal restaurants). Girlfriend's A1 Chinese level supported by choosing chains and tourist-friendly areas where possible (Haidilao, Meizhou Dongpo, Wangfujing area). Reservations recommended for: 见山江景火锅, 人和馆, AJIYA, 大董, 花家怡园. Weekday constraints respected for Beijing Days 11-13, 18-20 (no far trips during day, evening dining OK). Budget-conscious options included for extended Beijing stay. Data sourced from Gaode Maps POI search and Google Maps for international benchmarking.

data_sources.gaode_maps: Primary source for Chinese domestic restaurants (Chengdu, Bazhong, Beijing, Shanghai). POI keyword search for addresses and locations.
data_sources.google_maps: Secondary source for Shanghai Michelin restaurants and Chongqing hotpot with city views. Used for international benchmarking.
data_sources.rednote_mcp: Not available - MCP server requires display/X server which is unavailable in headless environment. Unable to verify restaurants via RedNote user reviews as originally planned.
data_sources.user_requirements: Must-visit restaurants from requirements-skeleton.json confirmed and incorporated where found

must_visit_confirmed: 老五酱肉包子 (Bazhong breakfast - Day 3)
清真老七牛肉 (Bazhong lunch - Day 3)
人和馆 Michelin Benbang (Shanghai - Day 5 dinner)
见山江景火锅 (Chongqing hillside hotpot - Day 1 dinner)
白茸·新派鲁菜 Michelin Guide (Shanghai - Day 7 lunch)
must_visit_missing: 牛丞丞 wagyu hotpot - Not found via Gaode Maps. Alternative provided: 牛膳寿喜锅 wagyu sukiyaki buffet on Day 4 lunch. Recommend manual verification of 牛丞丞 address or try alternative wagyu hotpot venues in Chengdu Taikoo Li area.
reservations_needed: 见山·江景山野火锅 (window seats for view)
important_reminders.language_support: Beijing restaurants selected with mix of tourist-friendly chains (Haidilao, Quanjude) and local spots. Wangfujing/Nanluoguxiang areas generally more English-friendly.
important_reminders.dietary: No restrictions noted. All restaurants accommodate general dining preferences.
important_reminders.budget_notes: Total estimated meal costs ~5,500 CNY per person for 21 days (excluding flight meals and Disneyland). Within reasonable range for China travel. Family meals Days 2-3 save budget for later splurges.
important_reminders.budget_eur_conversion: Total estimated ~715 EUR per person for all meals (21 days). Daily average ~34 EUR/day. Within €1000 total budget for 2 people for entire trip (excluding flights and shopping). Breakdown: Chongqing/Bazhong/Chengdu: ~430 CNY (56 EUR), Shanghai: ~1,490 CNY (194 EUR), Beijing: ~3,580 CNY (465 EUR).

verification_status.gaode_maps_verified: 明婷饭店, 饕林 (multiple locations), 老五酱肉包子, 清真老七牛肉, 人和馆, AJIYA (multiple locations), Beijing restaurants
verification_status.google_maps_verified: Shanghai Michelin restaurants (Fu He Hui 4.7★, 白茸 BFC), Chongqing hotpot (Xiaoyu Old Hot Pot 4.3★, South Mountain Yining 4.7★)
verification_status.rednote_verification: Not completed - MCP server unavailable due to headless environment (requires X server/display). Recommend manual RedNote verification before final bookings.
verification_status.missing_restaurant: 牛丞丞 wagyu hotpot - Not found in Gaode Maps POI search. Alternative provided: 牛膳寿喜锅 (similar wagyu concept). Recommend: 1) Check if 牛丞丞 is actual restaurant name or nickname, 2) Search Chinese review sites (Dianping/Meituan) manually, 3) Ask local contacts in Chengdu.
